name: AudioChannelCoordinateIndex
desc: Indexes the fields of the mCoordinates array in an AudioChannelDescription structure.

items.name: case coordinates_BackFront
items.desc: For rectangular coordinates, negative is back and positive is front. The units are specified by the mChannelFlags field.

items.name: case coordinates_DownUp
items.desc: For rectangular coordinates, negative is below ground level, 0 is ground level, and positive is above ground level. The units are specified by the mChannelFlags field.

items.name: case coordinates_LeftRight
items.desc: For rectangular coordinates, negative is left and positive is right. The units are specified by the mChannelFlags field of the AudioChannelDescription structure.

items.name: static var coordinates_Azimuth: AudioChannelCoordinateIndex
items.desc: For spherical coordinates, 0 is front center, positive is right, negative is left, and measurements are in degrees.

items.name: static var coordinates_Distance: AudioChannelCoordinateIndex
items.desc: For spherical coordinates, distance is radially from the center. The units are specified by the mChannelFlags field of the AudioChannelDescription structure.

items.name: static var coordinates_Elevation: AudioChannelCoordinateIndex
items.desc: For spherical coordinates, +90 is zenith, 0 is horizontal, -90 is nadir, and measurements are in degrees.
